item.title: Combining ImageMagick and Grails
item.description: When there is a need to work with images (thumbnailing, watermark, resize etc.) there is always ImageMagick that comes to the rescue. Combining this image utility powerhouse with the Grails framework is a task which can be easily accomplished. Steps: Install ImageMagick according to the installation instructions. It contains a utility called convert which we will need later on! This utility takes care of the conversion of images to thumbnails, watermarks etc.
